subject: Baseball
Race and Ethnicity
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: At 77, Bill White, the former player, broadcaster and National League president, recalls traveling in the Jim Crow South, friendship with Phil Rizzuto and conflict with Fay Vincent.
snippet: At 77, Bill White, the former player, broadcaster and National League president, recalls traveling in the Jim Crow South, friendship with Phil Rizzuto and conflict with Fay Vincent.
